system.effect: Characters with the Daemonic or Warp Instability trait that goes into melee range, or starts their turn within melee range of wearer, must make -20 Willpower Test. If failed they suffer 1d5 Energy Damage per Degree of Failiure ignoring Armour and Toughness. If they succeed by 4+ DoS the wards shatter and break.
